Articles.Content: Please consider making it possible to have independent thrust control per engine. For example, if I am using two liquid boosters with a main engine, it would be nice to throttle the liquid boosters to 100% while the main engine operates at 50%. I know that fuel pumps can be used to achieve similar results, but it doesn't allow enough granular control. Thanks!
Already suggested. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/44952-Already-Suggested-List (See section: Flight->Multiple throttle groups.)
pls give me excuse to buy ch throttle quadrant.
